lines.gurmukhi: AjXw ADInqw prm pivqR BeI grb kY isMG dyh mhw ApivqR hY
lines.transliteration_english: Ajayaa Adheenataa Param Pavitr Bhaee , Garab Kai Singh Dayh Mahaa Apavitr Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: A goat, herbivorous animal do good of yielding milk is considered pious and good because of its humble nature but a lion, proud and carnivorous is considered highly impious.

lines.gurmukhi: moin bRq ghy jYsy aUK mY pXUK rs bws bkbwnI kY sugMDqw n imqR hY
lines.transliteration_english: Moni Brat Gahay Jaisay Ookh Mai Payookh Rasa , Baas Bakabaanee Kai Sougandhataa N Mitr Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Because of his quiet nature, sugarcane has nectar-like juice in it, but noisy by nature bamboo cannot grasp any fragrance of sandalwood even if it grows close by.

lines.gurmukhi: mul hoie mjIT rMg sMg sMgwqI Bey Pul hoie kusMB rMg cMcl cirqR hY
lines.transliteration_english: Mul Hoi Majeetth Rang Sang Sangaatee Bhaay , Dhul Hoi Kousanbh Rang Chanchal Charitr Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Rubiaceous plant (Majitha) has its colour characteristic in the bottom part of the plant but when joined with a cloth gives it a beautiful red colour and integrates with it.

lines.gurmukhi: qYsy hI AswD swD dwdr Aau mIn giq gupq pRgt moh dRoh kY bicqR hY ]132]
lines.transliteration_english: Taisay Hee Asaadh Saadh Daadar Au Meen Gati , Goupat Pragat Moh Droh Kai Bachitr Hai ?132?

Shabad OS B.translation: Similarly a willful or self-oriented person is like a frog whose love for water is fake and a deceit but a God-oriented person is like a fish whose love for water is strange and unique. (132)
